title: React Frontend Engineer
description: Your responsibilities. Experienced React Frontend Developer (with at least 3 years of experience in this role), with a keen eye for design and UI/UX. With experience of working in a team, preferably for large international brands. You're proactive, curious, and passionate about utilizing AI tools in your day-to-day work. Here, it's not about ticking boxes - it's about thinking outside the box. Working in a team in which you will be an important and responsible member, who will influence the final appearance of the product. Work on an innovative project for a Fortune 500 retail giant, allowing you to handle diverse data from various applications and tools. Directly impact user efficiency, providing solutions that will shape the future of retail operations. Developing new user-facing features using React. Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use. Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code. Collaborating with other team members and stakeholders. Conducting regular code reviews to ensure code quality. Share your knowledge and learn from the best - together, we rise!Our requirements. A minimum 3 years of professional experience in frontend development, with a strong focus on React.. Proven experience working in international teams, demonstrating effective communication and collaboration skills. Strong proficiency in React, JavaScript and TypeScript. Hands-on knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, API design, REST, GitHub/Git, and Docker. Familiarity with web application security best practices - we've got to keep things secure. Optional. Experience in JS testing - if you've got it, flaunt it!. Familiarity with styled-components and MS Azure services such as Web app, Storage & Azure DevOpsThis is how we organize our work. Team size. 4-7. This is how we work. you focus on a single project at a timeyou can change the projectyou have influence on the technological solutions appliedyou have influence on the productyou develop the code "from scratch"you focus on product developmentagilescrumThis is how we work on a project. Clean Code. code quality measures. code review. design patterns. static code analysis. architect / technical leader support. Continuous Deployment. Continuous Integration. DevOps. SysOps. team-level deployment. documentationDevelopment opportunities we offer. industry-specific e-learning platforms. technical knowledge exchange within the companyWhat we offer. FLEXIBILITY: Enjoy the freedom of working from anywhere, and have a genuine say on our tools, tech, and solutions. STABILITY: Stable and long-term employment (employment contract, B2B). START-UP CULTURE: Open communication, creative problem solving and a flat hierarchy. GROWTH: Skyrocket your career by exploring new territories - you can work on various projects related to Big Data and Cloud. COLLABORATION: Be part of our diverse, passionate team, where every voice matters. Work in a company full of well-coordinated people who do their work with passion and commitment. BENEFITS: Employee benefits program, certification opportunities. EQUAL OPPORTUNITY CLOUDFIDE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employeesBenefits. sharing the costs of sports activities. sharing the costs of professional training & courses. remote work opportunities. flexible working time. integration eventsRecruitment stages. 1. Screening. 2. Tech Interview. 3. HR InterviewEQUAL OPPORTUNITY. CLOUDFIDE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.READY TO LAUNCH YOUR CAREER INTO THE STRATOSPHERE?. Don't just stand by, hit the "Apply" button and let's accelerate into the future together! Remember, at CLOUDFIDE there's no ceiling on what you can achieve.CLOUDFIDE SPÓŁKA Z OGRANICZONĄ ODPOWIEDZIALNOŚCIĄ. At CLOUDFIDE, we do everything with data and contribute to pivotal projects for Fortune 500 companies. This is your chance to enhance your skills and leave your global footprint.. Our collaborative culture champions your professional growth. Dive into cloud data processing, gain hands-on big data experience, and leverage our team's expertise to drive your professional growth.. Here you'll have an opportunity to use advanced technologies to shape client strategies. With CLOUDFIDE, you can amplify your career alongside the industry's best.. Scroll to the company’s profile

title: Remote Frontend Developer (Vue.js)
description: O projekcie. Dla Partnera z branży medycznej poszukujemy Frontend Developera (Vue.js). Specjalista dołączy do projektu, którego celem jest budowa portalu dla farmaceutów.Twój zakres obowiązków. Praca nad portalem dla farmaceutów przy użyciu frameworka Vue.js. Wsparcie programistyczne podczas wdrażania rozwiązań. Współpraca z zespołem programistów oraz testerów. Zbieranie wymagań biznesowychNasze wymagania. Minimum 4-letnie doświadczenie komercyjne na stanowisku Frontend Developer (Vue.js). Umiejętność pracy w metodykach zwinnych (Scrum). Dobra znajomość Vue.js, jQuery, CSS, HTML. Bardzo dobra znajomość języka JavaScript. Znajomość relacyjnych baz danychTo oferujemy. Spotkania integracyjne i możliwość uczestnictwa w meetupach technologicznych. Indywidualnego Opiekuna który zajmie się sprawami kadrowo/HR-owymi. 5000PLN za polecenie Specjalisty do któregokolwiek z naszych projektów. Bliską współpracę z doświadczonym zespołem Programistów, Testerów. Długofalową współpracę w dużej firmie o stabilnej strukturze. Elastyczność w przypadku chęci zmiany projektu. Proces rekrutacyjny prowadzony w pełni zdalnie. Długofalową współpracę. Pracę w 100% zdalnąBenefity. dofinansowanie zajęć sportowych. prywatna opieka medyczna. dofinansowanie szkoleń i kursów. komputer do użytku prywatnegoUprzejmie informujemy, że skontaktujemy się z wybranymi Kandydatami.Connectis_. Connectis_ to ponad 20 lat doświadczenia w branży, 60.000 Specjalistów IT i tysiące projektów zrealizowanych w 14 krajach.. Przewiń do profilu firmy
